thread.title_full: Cuba to host 60th Regional Meet for the Americas of UNWTOTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Cuba to host 60th Regional Meet for the Americas of UNWTOTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Cuba to host 60th Regional Meet for the Americas of UNWTO
According to an official report by Cuban authorities, Cuba will host the 60th Meeting of the Regional Committee for the Americas of the World Tourism Organization (UNWTO).
Cuba put forth the proposal to host the 60th Meeting of the Regional Committee for the Americas of the World Tourism Organization (UNWTO) during the General Assembly of UNWTO in Medellin, Colombia which was accepted unanimously.
The 60th Meeting will be held in Havana in May 2016.
A statement by the Ministry of Tourism (Mintur), released on Tuesday explains that a Cuban delegation headed by Tourism Minister Manuel Marrero attended the General Assembly of UNWTO in Medellin, Colombia.
The statement says that Cuba will continue to offer tourism of peace, health and safety to visitors.
The visitor arrivals to Cuba grew 17 percent this year and the interests of foreign investors in tourism sector also increased.
